snippet.title: PC : Fallendom (JAP)
snippet.description:
Fallendom is a doujin action RPG that developed and published by Platine Dispositif in 2013. It's first appearance was at the Comiket 85 (December 31, 2013).

For centuries, Temple of the Sun in Aurum continent was covered with blessing lights, and thus provide fortune for the people. Suddenly, for unknown reason the lights has disappeared. The elders then asked Kaka Marebito, the strongest warrior from Marebito village to investigate the incident
